string.value: #b#p2092000##k of #b#m251000000##k told me he needed to tell me something.

#p2092000# has been short on herbs that should be sent to #p2091002# due to the dastardly ways of Lord Pirate. #p2092000# told me other herbs will be needed to replace the original herb, and asked me to gather up as much #b#t04000294##k as possible...\n\n#i4000294# #t4000294# #b#c4000294##k

Sigh...this is really not good. I don't even have herbs stored now... what should I do..I am really short on ginseng now... sigh... And #p2091002# just asked for more ginseng... what should I do... hey you over there! What are you looking at? Are you willing to help me out?

Hoh... you're much nicer than most travelers. Well then, please get me some #b#t04000294##k. They aren't as potent as ginsengs, but they are close... it just requires more to achieve the same potency. I just want you to #bgather as many #t04000294#s as you possibly can#k.
If you're not interested, then just leave! What are you looking at?!
